item.title: Trump: 'Not my decision' to bring Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador

item.title: Trump to stop at Camp David for work retreat
item.description: President Trump plans to leave his New Jersey golf club this weekend and take a brief retreat with administration principals at Camp David on Sunday.

item.title: Trump says Musk will face 'consequences' if he backs Democrats
item.description: President Trump says former ally Elon Musk will face "serious consequences" if the billionaire bankrolls Democratic candidates during their feud.
